definition: to have only oneself to blame (idiom)/to bring trouble through one's own actions
fault/to blame/to punish/calamity/misfortune
to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)
self/oneself/from/since/naturally/surely
to take/to get/to choose/to fetch

sentences.english: Is killed the student to have only self to blame, aftergrows up must for the Guangzhou black eldest children.
sentences.chinese: 被杀学生咎由自取，长大后必为广州黑老大。

sentences.english: Yet the current mood of doubt is in many ways their own creation.
sentences.chinese: 目前各种怀疑情绪纯属他们咎由自取。

sentences.english: Gays, the Vatican believes, bring their misfortunes upon themselves.
sentences.chinese: 梵蒂冈认为同性恋者身遭不测是咎由自取。

sentences.english: He walks towards an imminent, self-given death?
sentences.chinese: 他正走向迎面而来的咎由自取的死亡吗？

definition: to reap what one has sown (idiom)/to stew in one's own juice
guilty and deserves to be punished (idiom); entirely appropriate chastisement/the punishment fits the crime
to suffer as a consequence of one's own actions/you asked for it/to bring it on oneself (sth unpleasant)
cannot blame/no wonder
death cannot wipe out the crimes (idiom); dreadful crimes that rankled even after the perpetrator is dead
disaster one brings on oneself/to be reponsible for something bad that happens to oneself/to have only oneself to blame
to eat one's own fruit (idiom); fig. suffering the consequences of one's own action/to reap what one has sown
(coll.) serve sb right/deservedly/ought/should
lit. to eat one's own bitter fruit (idiom)/fig. to suffer the consequences of one's own actions/to stew in one's own juice
appropriate retribution (idiom)
retribution/judgment
persisting in evil brings about self-destruction (idiom)
pinyin: duo1 xing2 bu4 yi4 bi4 zi4 bi4

definition: lit. helping tyrant Zhou 商紂王|商纣王[Shang1 Zhou4 wang2] in his oppression (idiom)/fig. to take the side of the evildoer/giving succor to the enemy
guilty of terrible crimes (idiom)/reprehensible
(derog.) this is all thanks to you!/well, thanks a lot!
to court disaster (idiom)/to dig one's own grave
